name: gera_comprovante_rfb
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool consulta_cnpj_tempo_real.
Tool description: API Tempo Real de Consultas a Receita Federal, Simples Nacional e Cadastro de Contribuintes (SINTEGRA).
API description: Generates a certificate from Receita Federal in PDF format.

taxid.description: The tax identification number to be used for generating the certificate.

pages.description: A comma-separated string specifying which pages to include in the certificate. Default is 'REGISTRATION,MEMBERS'.
